title: China hates crypto and scams, but is now outraged USA acquired bitcoin from a scammer
description: China hates crypto and scams, but is now outraged USA acquired bitcoin from a scammer

title: Moment Chinese 'Bitcoin Queen' is arrested in her bed...as she is jailed for 11 years for record-breaking £5.5billion crypto scam
description: This is the moment a Chinese fraudster involved in a Bitcoin scam worth more than £5billion was snared by police - while in bed. Zhimin Qian, known as the 'Bitcoin Queen', has today been jailed.

title: Londoners could benefit from £5.5bn crypto stash seized from fraudster
description: Zhimin Qian was jailed for 11 years after scamming more than 128,000 people and storing the funds in Bitcoin
